sentences.en: Bacteria are invisible to the naked eye.
It was strange, how invisible a clerk could feel.
sentences.cn: 一名办事员会感到如此受人忽视，令人觉得不可思议。

sentences.en: Many stars are invisible without a telescope.
sentences.cn: 许多星辰不用望远镜便看不见.

sentences.en: Many stars overhead are invisible to the naked eye.
sentences.cn: 天上的许多星星是肉眼看不到的.

sentences.en: Parents fear they might overstep these invisible boundaries.
sentences.cn: 父母担心他们可能会逾越这些无形的界限。

sentences.en: She was invisible in the dusk of the room.
sentences.cn: 她在昏暗的房间里别人看不到她.

sentences.en: stars invisible to the naked eye
The air is full of millions of invisible germs.
sentences.cn: 空气中充满了许多看不见的细菌.

sentences.en: The container is invisible until you shine an ultraviolet light on it.
sentences.cn: 那个柜子只有用紫外线照射才可以看见。

sentences.en: The house was surrounded by trees, and invisible from the road.
sentences.cn: 这所房子树木环绕，从路上是看不见的。

sentences.en: The invisible trade surplus was £200 million lower than reported.
sentences.cn: 无形贸易盈余比报道所称的少2亿英镑。
补好的地方几乎看不出来.

sentences.en: The problems of the poor are largely invisible.
sentences.cn: 穷人的问题大多不受重视。

sentences.en: The revenue from tourism is the biggest single item in the country's invisible earnings.
sentences.cn: 旅游业收入是该国无形收益当中最大的一项。

sentences.en: There’s an invisible barrier that keeps women out of top jobs.
sentences.cn: 女性想进入职场高层存在着无形的障碍。

sentences.en: Tourism is Britain's single biggest invisible export.
sentences.cn: 旅游业是英国最大的一项无形输出。

sentences.en: When I called, he was invisible.
sentences.cn: 我去访问时, 他没露面.

words.tran_cn: 看不见；看不见的东西；难看见
不明显的,微不足道的,无形的
未显示的,遮掩的,秘密的
隐藏的,不露面的,伪装的

trans.tran_en: something that is invisible cannot be seen
